parts.text:
LAMMPS

```json
{
"application": "LAMMPS",
"software": [
"openmpi/4.0.1",
"plumed"
],
"resources": {
"nodes": 1,
"cores": 15,
"memory": "2048 MB per core",
"time": "5 hours",
"partition": "long"
},
"input_files": [
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_146_152_144__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_146_172_144__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_146_173_144__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_148_121_147__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_148_122_147__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_148_16_147__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_148_17_147__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_149_121_147__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_149_122_147__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_149_16_147__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_149_17_147__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_14_100_12__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_14_101_12__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_14_103_12__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_14_104_12__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_14_31_12__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_14_32_12__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_14_4_12__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_14_5_12__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp",
"nvt_share_H_heated_cooled_away_close_metad_14_67_12__0-2_0-3_500_40000_index1.lmp"
],
"output_files": [
"bck.*.HILLS"
],
"command": "mpirun -np 15 /global/n2p2/bin/lmp_mpi < input_file"
}
```

The script is running LAMMPS, a molecular dynamics simulator. The script is using the OpenMPI library for parallel execution. It also seems to be using a library called PLUMED for enhanced sampling. The script requests 15 cores, 2048 MB of memory per core, and a maximum runtime of 5 hours. It also specifies that it should run on the "long" partition. The script runs 20 different LAMMPS simulations. It loads the openmpi/4.0.1 module and runs mpirun with 15 processes using the executable file /global/n2p2/bin/lmp_mpi. The input files are the 20 *.lmp files and the output files are bck.*.HILLS files. The script also removes the output files at the end.
